channel.title: How to use MoparScape?
channel.description:
First of all: I'm new to these forums and to MoparScape, so I'll probably ask some incredibly stupid questions.
I just downloaded the MoparScape client, the one that comes with HybridScape. I also downloaded a "Source" of a server on the forum, but I don't know how to make it work with the client.
Help, pl0x?

item.title: How to use MoparScape?
item.dc:creator: @cmrchris cmrchris
item.description:
@cmrchris wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:3, topic:417471”]click run.bat in the server, but you should try installing a client and server in the download section, its much easier.[/quote] Not hard eather way.

Read full topic
